quotes.quote: You'll continue to burn fat after you jog. People who run at least fout hours a week will burn more calories than non-runners, even they're not running.
If you have a body, you are an athlete.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Even if you lose a 1/2 a pound a week you'll still lose 26 pounds by this time next year.
Just keep going.
The only disability in a life is a bad attitude.
Never quit. Never give up.
It hurt now, but one day it ́ll be your warm up.
You can only fail if you quit.

Remember how, your clothes don't fit, your body feels sluggish, your skin doesn't glow, you don't have energy, you want to feel beautiful, you're regretting what ate, you're wishing you worked out, you wanted to change, before making another unhealthy choice.
Make your body the sexiest outfit you own.
Fit is not a destination, it is a way of life.
Don't be just another member of society, be a living example of your dreams and goals.
Don't wish for it, work for it.
The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
A one hour workout is 4% of your day. No excuses.
Your body is a reflection of your lifestyle.
Get moving no matter if it's 30 minutes or 2 hours, it counts.
Weight loss is like driving: If you ever veer off the road, just make U-turn and head back the right direction.
Sore? Tired? Out of breath? Sweaty? Good... It's working.
Have fun building your healthy, hard body.
Hills are speedwork in disguise.
For every excuse not to, there is a reason to do it anyway.
If you have time for Facebook you have time to exercise. It's not about having time, it's about making time.
Exercise is like an addiction. Once you're in it, you fell like your body needs it.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Everything is hard before it is easy.
Motivation is what gets you started, habit is what keeps you going.
Even a bad run is better than no run at all.
My body does not define me. I define my body.
Sacrifice is giving up on something good for something better.
Make the next 12 months the year of you. Every athlete everybody. It's time to bring your best then better it. Whatever you do.
Do it for yourself.
Excuses don't burn calories.
It's a slow process, keep going.
The good lord gave you a body that can stand most anything. It's your mind you have to convince.
Excuses are for people who don't want it bad enough.
30-60 minutes of being uncomfortable is better than being uncomfortable your entire life.
The scales are not the only way to measure progress. Your clothes fit better, you can workout longer, before and after pictures, more strength and endurance.
Stop beating yourself up! You are a work in progress, which means you get there a little at a time, not all at once.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
No one ever drowned in sweat.
Eat well, move daily, hydrate often, sleep lots, love your body. Repeat for life.
There will come day when you will look down at the scale, and after a moment of calculating, it will settle on your goal weight.
Complaining won't burn calories.
I will win not immediately, but definitely.
Just because you are close to your goal doesn't mean stop.
Small changes can make a big difference.
Weights won't lift themselves.
Amazing bodies don't just happen.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Be your own inspiration.
Commitment is a choice.
Sweat is fat crying.
Make exercise your natural high.
The question isn't can you? But will you? Challenge yourself!
Success doesn't happen overnight. Keep your eye on the prize and don't look back.
Forget about getting skinny. Eat well and end exercise the weight will take care of itself.
Goals are dreams with deadlines.
Be the best version of you.
Focus on how you feel after a workout.
Being challenged in life is inevitable. Being defeated is optional.
Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
When you're struggling imagine your dream body.
If not now, when?
You have to do what others won't to achieve what others don't.
The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
Change your thoughts and you will change your world.
Go do something that makes you sweat!
If you do not go after what you want you will never have it.
Working out doesn't have to be a chore, have fun with it.
Don't look pretty to exercise, exercise to look pretty.
Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health.
I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

If you always put limits on everything you do, physical or anything else, it will spread into your work and into your life. There are no limits. There are only plateaus; and you must not stay there, you must go beyond them.
Most of our obstacles would melt away if, instead of cowering before them, we should make up our minds to walk boldly through them.
Energy & persistence conquer all things.

I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed. “Michael Jordan”
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
I don't workout because I hate my body, I workout because I love it.
No matter how slow you go, you are still lapping everybody on the couch.
Eat clean, train dirty.
You're not going to get the butt you want by sitting on it.
If it doesn't challenge you, it doesn't change you.
Because today is another chance ti get it right.
Today it hurt. Tomorrow it works.
Strong is the new skinny.
No goal was ever met without a little sweat!
You don't have to go fast. You just have to go.
Train insane, or remain the same.
It never gets easier. You just get better.
Junk food satisfies you for a minute. Being fit satisfies you for life.
That voice in your head that says you can't do this is a liar.
The hardest step to fitness is the first. Take it now.
Some people dream of success, while others wake up and work at it.
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
I feel better in my mind when I work out. It makes everything better.
Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
Champions aren't made in the gyms. Champions are made from something they have deep inside them-a desire, a dream, a vision.
You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don't try.
